subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|阜|昜|ls=psc|ls2=ic|c1=s|c2=p|t1=hill|t2=sunshine}} – sun shining on a hill.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Either {{der|zh|sit}} or an {{w|Mainland Southeast Asia linguistic area|Mainland Southeast Asian (MSEA)}} Wanderwort; compare {{cog|my|လင်း||bright}}, {{cog|lep|tr=a-lóṅ|t=reflective light}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
